A pastorall called the Arcadia Acted by her Majesties Servants at the Phænix in Drury Lane. Written by Iames Shirly Gent. Arcadia Shirley, James, 1596-1666. Sidney, Philip, Sir, 1554-1586. Arcadia.
[68] p.
Printed by J[ohn] D[awson] for Iohn Williams, and F. Eglesfeild and are to be sould at the signe of the Crane in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1640.
An adaptation of: Sidney, Sir Philip. Arcadia. Partly in verse. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: [A]² B-I⁴. The first leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the University of Michigan. Library.
=======

Printed by J[ohn] D[awson] for Iohn Williams, and F. Eglesfeild and are to be sould at the signe of the Crane in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1640.
